feedback_prompts.name: Feedback Collection Prompts
feedback_prompts.description: Pre-written prompts for gathering specific types of feedback

immediate: How satisfied were you with this conversation?
Did the agent understand your request clearly?
Was your issue resolved to your satisfaction?
How likely are you to recommend our service?
follow_up: Looking back, how well did our agent help you?
Is there anything else you wish the agent had addressed?
How could we improve this type of interaction?

agent_knowledge: How knowledgeable was the agent about your topic?
Did the agent provide accurate information?
Were you confident in the agent's expertise?
communication: How clear were the agent's explanations?
Did the agent communicate in a way you could understand?
How professional was the agent's communication?
resolution: How effectively was your issue resolved?
Are you satisfied with the solution provided?
Do you feel confident about the next steps?

improvement_focused: What could we have done better in this conversation?
What additional information would have been helpful?
How could we improve the agent's performance?
What would make this type of interaction more effective?
